description: This file is a CLI script for initializing various project types, handling command-line arguments, parsing parameters, creating project configurations, and invoking project initialization routines. It also provides example usages and detailed inline documentation.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary, converting values to appropriate types (bool, int, float).

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path into an absolute path based on a provided base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths, suitable for JSON output.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Formats the output as a JSON object, including success status, message, and optionally the template info converted to dict.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main entry point of the script: parses arguments, creates config, generates template info, initializes project, and outputs result.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
